name: Little Legacy
description:
Fulfil your duty to your village by collecting items and deciding which should be included in the traditional time capsule. But remember, your choices will affect the people who come after you.

My submission for the Rainbow Jam 22. This is very much a proof of concept demo built as a way to learn some basic 3d modelling skills, so gameplay is thin on the ground. Still, what else are jams for, eh?

Controls:

  • Left-click to interact
  • Mouse wheel to zoom
  • A / D to rotate camera
  • W / S to raise / lower camera

Known issues:

  • Victory condition is bugged if you play through the game twice. If you'd like to play again, reload.
  • Camera controls aren't great
  • Omg better creaking SFX required!
  • Some items aren't as easy to interact with as they should be
